DOC.brief_title: Methylphenidate Treating Children With ADHD Tourette Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Tourette syndrome neurological disorder characterize repetitive , involuntary movement vocalization call tic . Many child Tourette syndrome also attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) , one common childhood mental disorder . Symptoms ADHD usually include impulsiveness , inattention , hyperactivity . ADHD commonly treat stimulant medication , methylphenidate . It debate , however , whether use stimulant child Tourette syndrome exacerbate tic associated disorder . This study evaluate safety effectiveness methylphenidate treat ADHD child ADHD Tourette syndrome . Participants 6-week , double blind study receive three dos methylphenidate course study . Each dose take twice daily , approximately 3.5 hour apart , 2 week . Medication dispense study visit , occur every 2 week . At study visit , participant take dose medication . About hour ingest medication , observed classroom set study physician . Participants complete Continuous Performance Test , measure voluntary attention level . The follow assess study visit : ADHD symptom ; oppositional aggressive behavior ; frequency severity tic obsessive compulsive disorder symptom ; rebound tic exacerbation ; effect methylphenidate tic-related problem self-esteem , family life , academic social performance , overall tic severity ; anxiety mood symptom ; adverse drug reaction . Parents teacher also complete assessment participant ' behavior 2 day week duration study .
